title: BCI Foods Inc. Recalls Meat and Poultry Soup Products Produced Without Benefit of Import Inspection
summary: WASHINGTON, Sept. 5, 2019 BCI Foods, Inc., a Quebec, Canada firm and importer of record, is recalling approximately 3,304 pounds of meat and poultry soup products that were not presented for import re-inspection, the U.S. Department of Agricultures Food Safety and Inspection Service (FSIS) announced...
